section.title: Toolbox.Core.Options.ApiOptions Class Reference

para.para: Configuration options for the HTTP API service.

listitem.para: string? BaseUrl [get, set]
Gets or sets the base URL for API requests.
ApiAuthenticationMode AuthenticationMode = ApiAuthenticationMode.Anonymous [get, set]
Gets or sets the authentication mode.
string? BearerToken [get, set]
Gets or sets the bearer token for authentication.
string? Username [get, set]
Gets or sets the username for basic authentication.
string? Password [get, set]
Gets or sets the password for basic authentication.
string? ApiKey [get, set]
Gets or sets the API key value.
string ApiKeyName = "X-API-Key" [get, set]
Gets or sets the API key header or parameter name.
ApiKeyLocation ApiKeyLocation = ApiKeyLocation.Header [get, set]
Gets or sets where to send the API key.
X509Certificate2? ClientCertificate [get, set]
Gets or sets the client certificate for authentication.
string? CertificatePath [get, set]
Gets or sets the path to a PFX/PKCS#12 certificate file.
string? CertificatePassword [get, set]
Gets or sets the certificate password.
string? OAuth2TokenUrl [get, set]
Gets or sets the OAuth2 token endpoint URL.
string? OAuth2ClientId [get, set]
Gets or sets the OAuth2 client ID.
string? OAuth2ClientSecret [get, set]
Gets or sets the OAuth2 client secret.
string? OAuth2Scopes [get, set]
Gets or sets the OAuth2 scopes.
TimeSpan Timeout = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(30) [get, set]
Gets or sets the request timeout.
int MaxRetries = 3 [get, set]
Gets or sets the maximum number of retry attempts.
TimeSpan RetryDelay = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(1) [get, set]
Gets or sets the delay between retries.
bool UseExponentialBackoff = true [get, set]
Gets or sets whether to use exponential backoff for retries.
bool ValidateCertificate = true [get, set]
Gets or sets whether to validate SSL certificates.
bool FollowRedirects = true [get, set]
Gets or sets whether to follow redirects automatically.
int MaxRedirects = 10 [get, set]
Gets or sets the maximum number of redirects to follow.
string? UserAgent = "Toolbox.Core.HttpApiService/1.0" [get, set]
Gets or sets the default User-Agent header.
IDictionary< string, string > DefaultHeaders = new Dictionary<string, string>() [get]
Gets the default headers to include in all requests.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Configuration options for the HTTP API service.
These options configure HTTP client behavior and authentication. The authentication mode determines which credential properties are used.
Definition at line 30 of file ApiOptions.cs.
